summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes discussions about market values of securities and the logistics of transferring these assets between financial entities. The communication is marked as confidential and involves multiple parties from Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is the sender of the email, coordinating the transfer of assets related to Epstein.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D Hurd is a recipient of the email, involved in processing the asset transfer.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is copied on the email, indicating her involvement in the asset transfer process.

persons.name: Janet E Young
persons.context: Janet E Young is the sender of a forwarded email discussing the asset transfer and market values.

connections.description: Vahe Stepanian is coordinating with Lisa D Hurd regarding the processing of asset transfers.
Vahe Stepanian includes Amanda Kirby in the email chain, indicating her role in the asset transfer process.
Vahe Stepanian forwards an email from Janet E Young regarding asset values and transfer logistics.

keyFacts: The document discusses the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Market values of specific securities are noted in the correspondence.
The email chain includes multiple parties from Deutsche Bank.
The communication is marked as confidential, indicating the sensitive nature of the information.
There are references to specific financial instruments and their market values.
